metadata.title: Nyx Professional Makeup Full Throttle Shadow Stick, Graphic Con, FTSS05

categorization.explanation: The product is a shadow stick, which is a type of eye makeup. Therefore, it fits best in the 'Eye Makeup' subcategory under 'Makeup' in 'Beauty & Personal Care'.
